title: Royal Enfield targets younger demography to drive sales of Hunter 350
description: The company launched also a new colour scheme in metro variant to win the younger customer base, Guleria said. "This model has got the higher number of bookings, apples to apples..." Royal Enfield chief commercial officer Yadvinder Singh Guleria said, without revealing the figures.
